pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interface to the PubChem Collection // Access PubChem data (compounds, substance, assays) using R. Structural information is provided in the form of SMILES strings. It currently only provides access to a subset of the precalculated data stored by PubChem. Bio-assay data can be accessed to obtain descriptions as well as the actual data. It is also possible to search for assay ID's by keyword.
